TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit XDeclaration extends System.Object

remarks.format: ## Remarks XML 声明用于声明 XML 版本、 编码和 XML 文档是独立。An XML declaration is used to declare the XML version, the encoding, and whether or not the XML document is standalone. 此类表示 XML 声明的 XML 概念。This class represents the XML concept of an XML declaration. XML 标准中一样，声明是与文档关联。Just as in the XML standard, declarations are associated with a document. 当创建文档时，你可以通过指定文档的声明。When you create a document, you have the option to specify the declaration for the document. 类包含属性，它允许你设置或获取声明。The class contains the property, which allows you to set or get the declaration. 有关如何序列化与 XML 声明的 XML 树的信息，请参阅[使用 XML 声明进行序列化](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/30f1b564-62b5-4e5d-9c36-884e51113feb)。For information about how to serialize an XML tree with an XML declaration, see [Serializing with an XML Declaration](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/30f1b564-62b5-4e5d-9c36-884e51113feb).

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Xml.Linq.XDeclaration other) cil managed

param.name: other
param.span: 用于初始化此 对象的 。

span.span: The used to initialize this object.

summary.span: 从另一个 对象初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class from another object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数是主要用于内部创建 XML 树的深层副本。This constructor is primarily used internally to make a deep copy of an XML tree.

MemberSignature.Value: public XDeclaration (string version, string encoding, string standalone);
.method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string version, string encoding, string standalone) cil managed
Public Sub New (version As String, encoding As String, standalone As String)
public: XDeclaration(System::String ^ version, System::String ^ encoding, System::String ^ standalone);

span.span: The version of the XML, usually "1.0".
The encoding for the XML document.

param.name: standalone
param.span: 包含"yes"或"no"的字符串，用来指定 XML 是独立的还是需要解析外部实体。

span.span: A string containing "yes" or "no" that specifies whether the XML is standalone or requires external entities to be resolved.

summary.span: 使用指定的版本、编码和独立状态初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified version, encoding, and standalone status.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的示例创建包含声明的文档。The following example creates a document that contains a declaration. ```csharp XDocument doc = new XDocument( new XDeclaration("1.0", "utf-8", "yes"), new XComment("This is a comment"), new XElement("Root", "content") ); doc.Save("Root.xml"); Console.WriteLine(File.ReadAllText("Root.xml")); ``` ```vb Dim doc As XDocument = _ content doc.Save("Root.xml") Console.WriteLine(File.ReadAllText("Root.xml")) ``` 该示例产生下面的输出：This example produces the following output: ```xml content ```

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Encoding { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置此文档的编码。

span.span: Gets or sets the encoding for this document.

value.span: 一个包含此文档的代码页名称的 。

span.span: A containing the code page name for this document.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 由 返回的任何值都是有效值。Any value returned by is a valid value. 如果你读取编码的文档，则此属性将设置为代码页名称。If you read an encoded document, then this property will be set to the code page name. 如果你将此属性设置为一个有效的代码页名称，然后在序列化时，LINQ to XML 将用指定的编码进行序列化。If you set this property to a valid code page name, then when serializing, LINQ to XML will serialize with the specified encoding. ## Examples 下面的示例创建两个文档，一个文档使用 utf-8 编码，另一个使用 utf-16 编码。The following example creates two documents, one with utf-8 encoding, and one with utf-16 encoding. 然后，该示例加载这两个文档并将编码输出到控制台。It then loads the documents and prints the encoding to the console. ```csharp Console.WriteLine("Creating a document with utf-8 encoding"); XDocument encodedDoc8 = new XDocument( new XDeclaration("1.0", "utf-8", "yes"), new XElement("Root", "Content") ); encodedDoc8.Save("EncodedUtf8.xml"); Console.WriteLine("Encoding is:{0}", encodedDoc8.Declaration.Encoding); Console.WriteLine(); Console.WriteLine("Creating a document with utf-16 encoding"); XDocument encodedDoc16 = new XDocument( new XDeclaration("1.0", "utf-16", "yes"), new XElement("Root", "Content") ); encodedDoc16.Save("EncodedUtf16.xml"); Console.WriteLine("Encoding is:{0}", encodedDoc16.Declaration.Encoding); Console.WriteLine(); XDocument newDoc8 = XDocument.Load("EncodedUtf8.xml"); Console.WriteLine("Encoded document:"); Console.WriteLine(File.ReadAllText("EncodedUtf8.xml")); Console.WriteLine(); Console.WriteLine("Encoding of loaded document is:{0}", newDoc8.Declaration.Encoding); Console.WriteLine(); XDocument newDoc16 = XDocument.Load("EncodedUtf16.xml"); Console.WriteLine("Encoded document:"); Console.WriteLine(File.ReadAllText("EncodedUtf16.xml")); Console.WriteLine(); Console.WriteLine("Encoding of loaded document is:{0}", newDoc16.Declaration.Encoding); ``` ```vb Console.WriteLine("Creating a document with utf-8 encoding") Dim encodedDoc8 As XDocument = _ Content encodedDoc8.Save("EncodedUtf8.xml") Console.WriteLine("Encoding is:{0}", encodedDoc8.Declaration.Encoding) Console.WriteLine() Console.WriteLine("Creating a document with utf-16 encoding") Dim encodedDoc16 As XDocument = _ Content encodedDoc16.Save("EncodedUtf16.xml") Console.WriteLine("Encoding is:{0}", encodedDoc16.Declaration.Encoding) Console.WriteLine() Dim newDoc8 As XDocument = XDocument.Load("EncodedUtf8.xml") Console.WriteLine("Encoded document:") Console.WriteLine(File.ReadAllText("EncodedUtf8.xml")) Console.WriteLine() Console.WriteLine("Encoding of loaded document is:{0}", newDoc8.Declaration.Encoding) Console.WriteLine() Dim newDoc16 As XDocument = XDocument.Load("EncodedUtf16.xml") Console.WriteLine("Encoded document:") Console.WriteLine(File.ReadAllText("EncodedUtf16.xml")) Console.WriteLine() Console.WriteLine("Encoding of loaded document is:{0}", newDoc16.Declaration.Encoding) ``` 该示例产生下面的输出：This example produces the following output: ``` Creating a document with utf-8 encoding Encoding is:utf-8 Creating a document with utf-16 encoding Encoding is:utf-16 Encoded document: Content Encoding of loaded document is:utf-8 Encoded document: Content Encoding of loaded document is:utf-16 ```

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Standalone { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置此文档的独立属性。

span.span: Gets or sets the standalone property for this document.

value.span: 一个包含此文档的独立属性的 。

span.span: A containing the standalone property for this document.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 独立的有效值是"是"或"否"。The valid values for standalone are "yes" or "no". 这些值不会强制执行。These values are not enforced. ## Examples 下面的示例使用此属性来打印的独立属性声明。The following example uses this property to print the standalone property of a declaration. ```csharp XDeclaration xd = new XDeclaration("1.0", "utf-8", "yes"); Console.WriteLine(xd.Version); Console.WriteLine(xd.Encoding); Console.WriteLine(xd.Standalone); ``` ```vb Dim xd As XDeclaration = New XDeclaration("1.0", "utf-8", "yes") Console.WriteLine(xd.Version) Console.WriteLine(xd.Encoding) Console.WriteLine(xd.Standalone) ``` 该示例产生下面的输出：This example produces the following output: ``` 1.0 utf-8 yes ```

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance string ToString() cil managed
Public Overrides Function ToString () As String

summary.span: 提供声明作为已格式化的字符串。

span.span: Provides the declaration as a formatted string.

returns.span: 一个 ，其中包含已格式化的 XML 字符串。

span.span: A that contains the formatted XML string.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Version { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置此文档的版本属性。

span.span: Gets or sets the version property for this document.

value.span: 一个包含此文档的版本属性的 。

span.span: A containing the version property for this document.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 该值通常为"1.0"。The value is usually "1.0". 此值不强制执行。This value is not enforced. ## Examples 下面的示例使用此属性来输出声明的版本属性。The following example uses this property to print the version property of a declaration. ```csharp XDeclaration xd = new XDeclaration("1.0", "utf-8", "yes"); Console.WriteLine(xd.Version); Console.WriteLine(xd.Encoding); Console.WriteLine(xd.Standalone); ``` ```vb Dim xd As XDeclaration = New XDeclaration("1.0", "utf-8", "yes") Console.WriteLine(xd.Version) Console.WriteLine(xd.Encoding) Console.WriteLine(xd.Standalone) ``` 该示例产生下面的输出：This example produces the following output: ``` 1.0 utf-8 yes ```
